settings.heading: Because your home is more than a house.
settings.content: We believe that many of life's best moments happen around the fire. It’s a place to explore, to grow, to learn, to work. A place of connection and well-being. And most importantly - a place to live.

settings.title: What We Do
settings.text:
As your local fireplace experts, we're here to bring your dream design to life. 

Though we have the best selection of brand-name products that feature energy-saving technology, what sets us apart is our commitment to serving our customers' needs.

settings.title: Projects We Work On
settings.text:
For more than 70 years, we've supported homeowners, builders, remodelers, architects, and designers across the US on residential and commercial projects.

No matter the size of the project, our team is equipped to handle the design, installation, and maintenance.

settings.title: How We Give Back
settings.text:
We're grateful to be part of our local communities across the US.

It's why we are so passionate about giving back to the neighborhoods we live and work in through organizations like Habitat for Humanity, Built to Honor and Housing First.

settings.title: Who We Are
settings.sub_text: Since 1951, we continue to make the fireplace selection and installation process easy by offering the best sales and service experience possible. We’re fireplace experts focused on the latest trends, technologies and brands to offer you the best solutions.

settings.title: Let's Build Your Perfect Fireplace Together
settings.content: From our in-person and virtual design assistance to the brand-name products in our showrooms, you'll find quality in everything we do. Not to mention a lifetime partner to ensure the integrity and functionality of your fireplace.

settings.title: Find a Fireplace Store Near You
settings.text:
Ready to add a fireplace to your homes or commercial projects? We can help! Find the nearest showroom near you.

Our team is ready to share their knowledge with you, so you feel confident and ready to take the next step!

settings.title: Building a Community of Pro Builders
settings.text: We offer continuing education and training programs to our network of pros to provide easier access to upcoming fireplace design trends, products, and technology.
